title: Succession from annual plants to hardwood trees 2

content.description:
Directions: Answers must be in essay form. Outline form is not acceptable. Labeled diagrams may be used to supplement discussion, but in no case will a diagram alone suffice. It is important that you read each question completely before you begin.

The diagram above shows the succession of communities from annual plants to hardwood trees in a specific area over a period of time.
content.question: Describe and explain THREE changes in abiotic conditions over time that lead to the succession, as shown in the diagram above.

frqParts.text: Describe and explain THREE changes in abiotic conditions over time that lead to the succession, as shown in the diagram above.

skill.text: 2.C: Explain how biological models relate to larger principles, concepts, processes, systems, or theories.
